cause.description:
This cause is dedicated to bringing the love and harmony of the Holy Five to the entire world. invite everyone. SPREAD THE SPICE!
1. Be always reverant to the Holy Five
2. Fat Kid wont laugh at you if you don't laugh at Fat Kid. :]
cause.mission: Unite the World using Peace, Love, and the moving melodies of the holy five: The Spice Girls
cause.name: One World, Under Spice
